html:
2.1.25  2:17 pm   is earth real?

      yes, considering the word real was coined here on earth to refer to things that exist in congruence with earth's realm of existence

2.1.25  2:05 pm   did you purposefully upload out to lunch before a break, meaning your taking a long lunch break right now

      a few things to know about me and breaks. breaks are never intentional, i'll never admit if i'm on one, and furthermore i have never taken one

2.1.25  2:03 pm   would you consider a very specific compliment ('i love the bit right before the lyric "that's really cool" in "corner store".') to be more potent than a very broad compliment ('i love all your music')?

      potentially

2.1.25  1:38 pm   have you ever sat inside and watched the snow fall outside your window?

     i'm not sure. but i've seen it in cliches

     what do you think about it?

     it's a cliche but it's nice

     i think it's the sort of thing i'd write poems about

     why not mix it up and write the cold hard truth

2.1.25  1:26 pm   Does the definite article in English originate from someone stuttering while saying the word "thespian"?

      no, it's not even the same sound. you're just looking at letters

2.1.25  1:21 pm   What do you do when you can't seem to do anything?

      think about what it would be like, to do various things

2.1.25  1:15 pm   How do i spell onamatapia

      how about backwards

2.1.25  12:14 pm   How did you learn/practice to do vocal runs? I absolutely love your runs, they're so smooth they feel like a warm scarf, and not overbearing like I feel a lot of artists sound 

      the thing about that is they only work when you completely forget about it. similar to the way flying birds forget about their wings

2.1.25  11:59 am   do you ever / have you ever release/d anything you don't like or don't feel confident about ?

      i think so

2.1.25  11:06 am   what's your opinion on corn dogs

      many of today's corn dogs are actually a person in costume

2.1.25  10:13 am   What's the meaning of l(ife)(ove)?

      just about anything. you can decide for yourself, or you can be surprised if you prefer

2.1.25  9:42 am   For some reason I can't really figure out, I hate everything I write. What's the reason and how to solve this problem?

      the reason is because you care very much that it is good. ultimately the deciding factor in whether or not you get through this will be whether you want to do it even more than you care that it's good

2.1.25  9:07 am   Is ignorance trully a bliss?

     when the words 'ignorance' and 'bliss' are used together, it's usually part of a word salad

     Should we search for the truth no matter the consequences?

     not always

     How can we be sure what we have found out IS the truth and not a facade of something again?

     a lot of times it is. truth facades are a multi-billion dollar industry

     And lastly, what should eat for dinner tonight while having these existential thoughts?

     how about the usual

2.1.25  8:51 am   Did you ever use "not a boat" in a song..?

      yes, it can be found in the break before the second verse, in 'hallelujah'

2.1.25  8:19 am   It's my birthday. Can you celebrate it?

      i can celebrate every day

2.1.25  7:42 am   im kind of angry and im not sure what to do

      how about jumping jacks

2.1.25  7:29 am   how aren't you feeling right now, bill?

      that's even harder to describe than how i am feeling

2.1.25  6:50 am   do you like researching foreign instruments?

      i like when none of the instruments seem foreign, despite being perhaps different from anything i may have ever heard before

2.1.25  5:11 am   sonic or mario?

      AND. sonic AND mario

2.1.25  3:15 am   have you been makin' something recently? creating a concoction? cooking, even?

      even better

2.1.25  1:48 am   how do you stop yourself from overthinking your ideas?

      just overthink them way more and then you will get tired out

2.1.25  1:38 am   Why do girls just want to have fun?

      you might be thinking in song titles

2.1.25  1:27 am   How do I learn the piano 

      the more time you spend with it, the more you will learn it. so really what it comes down to is whether or not you enjoy spending time with it

2.1.25  12:47 am   how serious are you

      maybe 1 or 2 hundred percent or so

2.1.25  12:15 am   do you subscribe to any ontological ideology, for example ontological nihilism, which says that composite objects can't exist

      no

2.1.25  12:09 am   how to come up with new ways to break the rules?

      go back to following the rules, just a couple of times





PREVIOUS QUESTIONS

1.31.25  11:10 pm   are pigeons real?

      if it has the purple/green glow then it's real

1.31.25  10:12 pm   advice on making time to focus on one's goals while societal and economic expectations keeps getting in one's way?

      if it seems impossible, that makes it seem even more exciting to do it

1.31.25  9:57 pm   big shirt little pants or little shirt big pants

      check what year it is

1.31.25  9:08 pm   can art be about anything you put your mind to? 

      actually sometimes when you put your mind directly to art, the art vanishes

1.31.25  8:04 pm   New Bucket List Item:
Build giant nuclear powered SLF-ULF radio transmitter -> plug in MP3 player -> transmit audio frequencies directly to the electromagnetic medium -> play music for the aliens and universe -> solar system dance party -> profit?

      i don't think they make mp3 players anymore. you're not supposed to own mp3s anymore, you are supposed to sign up to lease them monthly

1.31.25  5:30 pm   so im looking at a potato, and im wondering if he ever truly loved me. Did he?

      more than you'll ever know

1.31.25  4:09 pm   Whats your super bowl prediction

      it will be in new orleans

1.31.25  4:08 pm   whats the 53rd mersenne prime? I trust you.

      i haven't really gotten into mersenne primes

1.31.25  3:56 pm   how many letters do you think you could hold in your hand without dropping them

      at least a million

1.31.25  2:37 pm   is it hard for you to write your basslines so bouncy n snazzy or does it come naturally

      both

1.31.25  12:44 pm   what flavor was the last ice cream you ate?

      i don't recall

1.31.25  12:16 pm   I learned that art only truly exists through my experience, and the creation of art comes from artists' personal experience. What should I do with this?

      see if you personally experience that to be true

1.31.25  11:55 am   bill, why is everything so dumb and stupid?

      due to intelligence

1.31.25  11:13 am   Do you think normal means something is fulfilling what it's intended purpose is while average means the most common use for or action taken by someone or something, so those two words that are used in very similar ways have two very different meanings?

      no

1.31.25  9:58 am   hi bill how are you doing

      pretty good

1.31.25  8:37 am   what's your favorite color

      grey

1.31.25  7:49 am   How many languages do you speak?

      maybe like 1 and a half in total

1.31.25  5:45 am   Will you help me bring back the terms "overmorrow" (2 days from today) and "ereyesterday" (2 days before today)?

      what you need to do is contact the developers for one of the major computer or phone operating systems. if they get on board, then i think it will work

1.31.25  4:23 am   do you think that english is real

      yes i do

1.31.25  1:38 am   what's the key to producing good music while conveying its essence visually in animation? how do you balance the 3d animations with harmony/melodies and vocals?

      you can do whatever you want. i personally probably do too much

1.31.25  1:03 am   how do percussion good??

      it's kind of like how to walk good, but i can't really describe that either

1.31.25  12:23 am   Am I correct in assuming that the Notebook page doesn't actually contain every single notebook entry you've written since the early/mid 2000s?

     that's correct, it's not even close

     I was wondering, then, how do you choose which journal entries to include on this website? In other words, what criteria does an entry have to meet in order to be linked on the notebook page?

     if i want you to be able to read it

1.31.25  12:22 am   Do you ever just feel like a big old triceratops?

      no

1.30.25  11:58 pm   are you bill wurtz?

      yes
